scene_description_enriched: Two male figures, identified as saints by their halos, stand side-by-side. The figure on the left holds a large key and an open book, while the figure on the right grasps a sword and also holds an open book. Both figures are depicted with beards and wear robes. Behind them, an architectural element resembling a stylized archway with decorative tracery is visible, suggesting a sacred or monumental setting. The scene is rendered in a woodcut style, with strong linework and hatching.
